from his horse and run to the standard. 
"Forward, lads!" he shouted in a voice pierc- ing as a child's. 
"Here it is!" thought he, seizing the staff of the standard and hearing with pleasure the whistle of 'bullets evidently aimed at him. Sev- eral soldiers fell. 
"Hurrah!" shouted Prince Andrew, and, scarcely able to hold up the heavy standard, he ran forward with full confidence that the whole battalion would follow him.
